name: order_details
title: Order Details
description: Lists relevant information about an order
statement:
SELECT
  orders.order_id,
  order_timestamp,
  required_date,
  shipped_date,
  CONCAT(products.product_id, ': ', product_name) AS product,
  order_details.unit_price,
  order_details.quantity,
  order_details.discount
FROM orders
INNER JOIN order_details ON
  order_details.order_id = orders.order_id
INNER JOIN products ON
  products.product_id = order_details.product_id
WHERE
  orders.order_id = $order_id
